title: Cardi B exhibits her jaw-dropping cleavage in a racy nurse Halloween costume
text:
Cardi B started Halloween early as she slipped into a racy nurse costume to take to the stage in New Jersey with her husband Offset on Friday.

The singer, 27, showcased her jaw-dropping cleavage as she went braless in the keyhole cut-out minidress.

Cardi certainly set pulses racing in the sexy uniform, which came complete with a stethoscope and cap.

Terrifying: Cardi B started Halloween early as she slipped into a racy nurse costume to take to the stage in New Jersey with her husband Offset on Friday

Donning a vibrant scarlet wig, Cardi amped up the raciness with her skintight knee-high PVC boots.

She finished off her Halloween look with a bold red lip, dramatic lashes and pink eyeshadow.

The Bodak Yellow hitmaker appeared in high spirits as she joined Offset on stage for the powerful performance.

Temperatures soaring: The singer, 27, showcased her jaw-dropping cleavage as she went braless in the keyhole cut-out minidress as she took to the stage

The couple seems to be doing well since their split in December of last year amid reports that Offset had cheated.

After some very public apologies in which Offset professed his love both in person and on social media, they reunited two months later in February.

Any lingering rumors that Cardi and Offset's marriage was on shaky grounds were quashed when the couple took to the stage at the 61st annual Grammy Awards.

All eyes on her: Cardi certainly set pulses racing in the sexy uniform, which came complete with a stethoscope and cap

Stage: Cardi ensured all eyes were on her as she took to the stage at the Prudential Center

Romance: Cardi and Offset put on a cosy display as they locked lips on stage

Offset joined his wife as she accepted the award for Best Rap Album at the February 11th awards show.

They are both proud parents to Kulture, who was born in July 11, 2018.

Kulture's birth came just weeks after Cardi B confirmed in a statement that she and Offset had got married the September prior.

Impressive: The Bodak Yellow hitmaker appeared in high spirits as she joined Offset on stage for the powerful performance
description: Cardi B started Halloween early as she slipped into a racy nurse costume to take to the stage in New Jersey with her husband Offset on Friday.
